thread.section_title: Sportsmemorabilia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportsmemorabilia | www.sportsmemorabilia.com
thread.title: Steve Stuber

author: Steve Stuber
title: Steve Stuber
text: I hadn't recieved any tracking information on an order I placed. Melissa Ospina was very understanding and diligent in getting back to me. She dealt with the problem and offered me a replacement or a refund as well solution. Melissa genuinely cared about my problem and rectified is situation immediately. I look forward to dealing with her in the future! Amazing customer service.
